content:
With over 12 years of experience in the IT industry, I have honed my skills in designing and developing scalable cloud-native applications. I specialize in leveraging AWS services alongside technologies such as Java, Go, and Spring Boot to deliver robust and efficient solutions. I hold multiple AWS certifications, the HashiCorp Certified Terraform Engineer credential, and a master’s degree in computer science from Germany. Here are my key areas of expertise:
Cloud Industry Expertise (AWS, Azure, GCP) Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation, & AWS CDK) Programming Languages (Java, Go, Node.js, etc.) DevOps Automation & CI/CD Pipelines Cloud Security & Best Practices Containerization & Kubernetes Scalable and Resilient Cloud Architectures You can view my professional certifications here.
I have had the privilege of collaborating with industry leaders like Volkswagen (VW) and MAN Truck & Bus SE, where I contributed to building and optimizing high-performance cloud-native infrastructures for data-intensive applications. Additionally, I have worked directly within AWS, providing solutions to complex internal projects.
With extensive experience in microservices architecture and domain-driven design, I consistently deliver reliable, high-quality solutions that meet the diverse needs of my clients. I am passionate about exploring new technologies and solving intricate challenges, with a strong focus on performance improvements and automation. My goal is to apply my skills and experience to deliver innovative, scalable solutions that exceed client expectations and drive business success.
You can reach out me via this contact form here.
